jobInfo.Jobdescription:
Job Responsibilities:


  • Primary role is to bring Consumer Data Platform expertise into action.
  • Own and execute CPD related tasks on client platform (Tresure Data)
  • Align on various business use cases with client stakeholders for feasibility and prepare BRDs.
  • Design CDP schema where needed to ensure the data ingestion process is well aligned with the platform.
  • Ability to guide execution team on aligned workstreams with the client stakeholders
  • Lead execution of day-to-day tasks
  • Identify and troubleshoot any problems in Tresure data platform
  • In-product development within TD as possible.
  • Ability to answer and manage business questions/ asks within platform usage.
  • Establish SLAs and adhere to it for tasks within CDP platform.

 

Requirements & Qualifications:


  • The Individual should have minimum of 5 years of experience in working on Consumer data platform and a minimum of 1 year hands on work on Treasure data platform
  • Need to be Data module expert with experience in configuration and ingestion set up.
  • Strong knowledge of CDP Domain â€“ Experience in enabling business use cases leveraging CDP for enterprise companies.
  • Experience in gathering business requirements, formulating metrics and building highly scalable solutions. 
  • Ability to lead a team or work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
  • Excellent oral and written communication skills.
  • Ability to plan roadmap, prioritize tasks, manage dependencies and deliver on time.
  • Ability to create collaborative relationships with partners, stakeholders and customers while managing expectations, managing concerns and risks, and communicating progress.


Qualification: Graduate (Computer Science. B.Tech, B.E) / Postgraduate.


Certifications (good to have): 


Treasure Data Expert Certified: CDP for Marketing

Treasure Data Expert Certified CDP for Data Management
